text: [[img:icon_slaves]][[/img]]Slaves are the lifeblood of the Dark Elf economy, captured in battle as well as by other means to provide additional [[img:icon_income]][[/img]]income. High numbers of slaves grant construction bonuses, but can negatively affect  [[img:icon_public_order]][[/img]]control. Slaves can be sacrificed to perform rites and provincial slave diktats.
